FOLKS.Definition: people, especially those of a particular group or type

ASHAMED.Definition: feeling guilty or embarrassed about something you have done or about a quality in your character

DEFENSE MECHANISM.Definition: an automatic way of behaving or thinking by which you protect yourself from something, especially from feeling unpleasant emotions

BLOW THIS MOTHERFUCKER UP.Definition: blow (something) up= to destroy something with a bomb

GODDAMN.Definition: used to add emphasis to what is being said

LIKE A MOTHERFUCKER.Definition: to put emphasis on what was just said

CHASE.Definition: to hurry after someone or something in order to catch him

CALL ME BACK.Definition: call back= to phone someone again, or to phone someone who called you earlier

PLAY LIKE.Definition: a colloquial way of saying 'act/behave as if'

IN.Definition: the word “in” is being used to say “present (in the building)

CUSS HER MOTHERFUCKING ASS OUT.Definition: cuss (somebody) out=to swear at someone, especially at length

I'M OUT THIS MOTHERFUCKER.Definition: a colloquial (and vulgar) way of saying ‘I’m leaving.’

COLLOQUIAL.Definition: (of language) used in ordinary or familiar conversation; not formal or literary

ABOLISHED.Definition: to end an activity or custom officially

SEGREGATED.Definition: kept separate or treated differently according to race, sex, religion, etc.

STEREOTYPE.Definition: a widely held but fixed and oversimplified image or idea of a particular type of person or thing

BADASS.Definition: used to describe someone cool or impressive

NIGGA.Definition: a way of saying or writing nigger (= an extremely offensive word for a black person)
